text: (gentle music)
- My name is Mohammed Arif.
I am working as a network tech
in one of AWS data center in Abu Dhabi.
When I was studying back home in Pakistan,
I took class C++.
I was like a science graduate
and I got my first job which was related
to managing one of the company database.

We were getting the samples
from the laboratory,
updating our system,
and then we were getting the prediction
based on those results.

So that was my first job
related to managing AWS.

The most exciting part of my
job is customer obsession.

Like you have to come
sometime with the innovation.

And AWS really appreciate if
you are bringing something
that will help your customer
bringing those innovation into the role.
(lively music)
